Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Mama \& Papa's Fish Shack

The main room of a fish shack. A medium-sized room with heavily carved walls lit by wall sconces and a small chandelier that hangs in the middle of the ceiling. The room is sparsely decorated with worn oak furnishings, including two booths that occupy the northeastern corner and the eastern wall. At the center of the room is a modest table fit for two. A table for four is tucked into the southeastern corner. To the northwest is a serving counter accompanied by a few stools before a serving window just behind it.

The main room of a fish shack. A medium-sized room with heavily carved walls that is lit by wall sconces and a small chandelier that hangs in the middle of the ceiling. The room is sparsely decorated with worn oak furnishings, including two booths that occupy the northeastern corner and the eastern wall. At the center of the room is a modest table fit for two. A table for four is tucked into the southeastern corner. To the northwest is a serving counter accompanied by a few stools before a serving window just behind it. Overall, the room appears to be cozy despite the distinct smell of tobacco, alcohol, and fish. There is a window in the southern wall allowing for a modest view of Piazza di Gioco and the ocean.
a solid oak door leading south
A large, solid door made of oak lumber leads to the south. $(parent-desc)
A large, solid door made of oak lumber leads to the south. $(parent-desc)
a solid oak door leading west
A large, solid door made of oak lumber leads to the west. $(parent-desc)
A large, solid door made of oak lumber leads to the west. $(parent-desc)
the ceiling
Thick, dark oak joists, sagging and uneven, cross the ceiling about eight feet overhead. They support wide wooden planks, which have been plastered and whitewashed.
There seems to be a ceiling overhead in this dark room, supported by thick wooden beams.
Thick, dark wooden joists, sagging and uneven, cross the ceiling about eight feet overhead in this dim room. They support wide wooden planks, which have been plastered.
Thick wooden joists, sagging and uneven, cross the ceiling. They support wide wooden planks, which have been plastered and whitewashed.
There seems to be a ceiling not far above your head in this dark room.
This dim room has a ceiling of thick, sagging wooden beams supporting plastered planks.

the uneven, oak floor
The floor is made from smooth oak planks, of various widths. The planks are not entirely evenly laid, and some have warped slightly, so that the floor is a bit uneven.
The uneven floor of a dark room is made from smooth wooden planks, of various widths.
The floor of the dim room is made from smooth wooden planks, of various widths. The floor is warped and a bit unevenly laid.
The floor is made from smooth oak planks, of various widths. The planks are not entirely evenly laid, and some have warped slightly, so that the floor is a bit uneven.
The floor is made from smooth wooden planks, of various widths.
The floor is made from smooth wooden planks, of various widths. The floor is a bit uneven.
the middle of the room

the heavily carved eastern wall

The eastern wall has been crafted from uneven planks of ashen oak, that appear as if they've been pulled straight from the docks outside. The entire span of the eastern wall has been carved with a majestic, full-sailed ship. Masts reaching to the ceiling, the ship sprawls in its sea washed glory from corner to corner, its siren figurehead arched toward the northern wall, as if cresting walls of heaving waves.

The eastern wall has been crafted from uneven planks of ashen oak, that appear as if they've been pulled straight from the docks outside. The entire span of the eastern wall has been carved with a majestic, full-sailed ship. Masts reaching to the ceiling, the ship sprawls in its sea washed glory from corner to corner, its siren figurehead arched toward the northern wall, as if cresting walls of heaving waves.
the heavily carved northern wall

The northern wall has been crafted from uneven planks of ashen oak, that appear as if they've been pulled straight from the docks outside. The entire span of the northern wall has been carved with the image of a humpbacked whale. Held aloft in the center of the wall by lines meant to represent underwater currents, the full pleated body of the whale reaches from its knobby, thin head at the topmost eastern corner, to an overlarge curl of tail at the bottom west.

The northern wall has been crafted from uneven planks of ashen oak, that appear as if they've been pulled straight from the docks outside. The entire span of the northern wall has been carved with the image of a humpbacked whale. Held aloft in the center of the wall by lines meant to represent underwater currents, the full pleated body of the whale reaches from its knobby, thin head at the topmost eastern corner, to an overlarge curl of tail at the bottom west.
the heavily carved southern wall

The southern wall has been crafted from uneven planks of ashen oak, which appear as if they've been pulled straight from the docks outside.
The entire length of the southern wall has been carved with an underwater mermaid. Sprawling in a sinuous dip, a heavily carved mermaid reaches from a wave of finely scaled tail, and gossamer fin over the window, to her curled upper half that bends over the door towards the bottom west corner. A wash of frozen hair floats upon unseen waves, obscuring the majority of her face, save for a solitary winking eye, and the corner of lips curved into a smile. Schools of fish line the wall, in undulant fleets of varisized bodies along the edges, save for one solitary flounder with puckered lips near the mermaids face.

The southern wall has been crafted from uneven planks of ashen oak, which appear as if they've been pulled straight from the docks outside.
The entire length of the southern wall has been carved with an underwater mermaid. Sprawling in a sinuous dip, a heavily carved mermaid reaches from a wave of finely scaled tail, and gossamer fin over the window, to her curled upper half that bends over the door towards the bottom west corner. A wash of frozen hair floats upon unseen waves, obscuring the majority of her face, save for a solitary winking eye, and the corner of lips curved into a smile. Schools of fish line the wall, in undulant fleets of varisized bodies along the edges, save for one solitary flounder with puckered lips near the mermaids face.
the western wall

The western wall has been crafted from uneven planks of ashen oak, which appear as if they've been pulled straight from the docks outside.
The entire length of the western wall has been carved into the image of a scrolled treasure map. A dotted trail leads from a length of pebbled shore at the southern corner of the wall, around rudimentary mountain ranges spewing to the sky, and through a palm tree-dotted jungle, before ending in an overlarge ‘~X~’ above the serving window in the northwest corner. The area around the serving window itself has been carved to appear as if it is a heavy chest, overflowed with strings of ashen gems of all sizes, and surrounded by piled coins.

The western wall has been crafted from uneven planks of ashen oak, which appear as if they've been pulled straight from the docks outside.
The entire length of the western wall has been carved into the image of a scrolled treasure map. A dotted trail leads from a length of pebbled shore at the southern corner of the wall, around rudimentary mountain ranges spewing to the sky, and through a palm tree-dotted jungle, before ending in an overlarge ‘~X~’ above the serving window in the northwest corner. The area around the serving window itself has been carved to appear as if it is a heavy chest, overflowed with strings of ashen gems of all sizes, and surrounded by piled coins.
the walls
There are walls surrounding the room.
There are walls surrounding the room.
heavily carved serving window in the northwest corner

A serving window through which food is delivered from the kitchen beyond, with a small ledge for holding plates ready to be delivered. The area around the serving window itself has been carved to appear as if it is a heavy chest, overflowed with strings of ashen gems of all sizes, and surrounded by piled coins.

A serving window through which food is delivered from the kitchen beyond, with a small ledge for holding plates ready to be delivered. The area around the serving window itself has been carved to appear as if it is a heavy chest, overflowed with strings of ashen gems of all sizes, and surrounded by piled coins.
two windows set in the southern wall
A pair of windows set in the southern wall allows for a view of Piazza di Gioco and the ocean. Through the windows:
A pair of windows set in the southern wall allows for a view of Piazza di Gioco and the ocean. Through the windows:

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ \{ \ \{ A flurry of loud singing can be heard from the docks outside as a group of sailors travels past. \| A loud clanging bell can be heard from outside as another ship pulls into the dock outside. \| Laughing loudly, a group of disheveled sailors bursts through the door, loosely assembling around the room to guzzle tankards of ale before returning to the day's work. \| A squat overweight woman angrily gestures to a tall hunched man with her ladle, smacking his hand away from a large pot of salt cod soup. \| A tall hunched man slumps in a chair, his head lolling to the side just a bit before he awakens himself with a loud snore. \| A squat overweight woman hums to herself chipperly as she tidies her bonnet and continues to clean up around the room. \| A squat overweight woman briefly steps to the window, tossing scraps of old food outside. The cries of a flock of seagulls can be heard as they swoop down to make quick work of cleaning up. \| A large group of rough-looking sailors trudges into the door, sheepishly doffing their hats and scuffing their feet as the squat overweight woman merrily sets about filling platters of freshly cooked fish dishes for the young men. \| A tall hunched man cackles to himself quietly as he lifts up his tankard to take another long draw from the liquid inside. \| A lone, skulking sailor boy peeks into the door from outside, smiling as he makes eye contact with the squat overweight woman. He scurries over and gladly grabs up the bowl of soup she offers him before quickly disappearing out the door. \} \ \} \{ \ \{ The sound of the waves lapping against the docks outside can just barely be heard, the night bringing a moderate quiet to the otherwise bustling area of town. \| A lone whistle can be heard outside as a ship carefully glides into the docks, its lantern light briefly spilling through the window to the south. \| A ruckus of singing and laughter can be heard along the docks outside as the sailors leave their ships and head into town for the night. \| A large group of sailors, young and old alike, file through the door, laughing and chattering loudly as they assemble around a nearby table to enjoy a hot meal and cold ale. \| With a rumble of laughter, a tall hunched man clanks his tankard against that of a comrade, the two dissolving into cackles over a shared joke. \| A squat overweight woman bustles about the room, wiping clean tables and refilling plates as she smiles and chatters with the patrons. \| With a devilish glint in his wrinkled old eyes, a tall hunched man reaches over and gooses a squat overweight woman as she passes by. He cackles with delight as she squeals and promptly clocks him on the head with her ladle. \| A group of young men stare in awe as a tall hunched man recounts an outrageous tale of his days at sea. He refills their mugs and tankards as they listen, his story seeming to last as long as the constantly refilled drinks do. \| The room is filled with the merry sounds of chatter as sailors drift in and out to grab drinks and food, a fresh billow of sea breeze following every exit and entrance. \| A squat overweight woman hums a merry little jingle as she waddles around the room wiping off tables and chattering with customers here and there. \} \ \} \}
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "You catch the muffled sound of the evening bell."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "The deep sound of midday bells is heard from outside."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "Outside, the bells announce midnight."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "The church bells herald the morning."); return TRUE;
